Package Main.Others

Class GameFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
Main.Others.GameFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class GameFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
Public class GameFrame is responsible for loading between all the different screens in the game. These screens include the HomeMenu, GameBoard, HighScore Board, Custom Console and Info Screen. When the game is launched, the GameFrame first loads in the HomeMenu. The buttons on the HomeMenu are then clicked to access all the other screens.
Since:
28/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
TanZhunXian, Filippo Ranza
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • GameFrame

      public GameFrame() throws java.io.IOException
      This constructor loads the HighScore Board, Custom Console, HomeMenu and Info Screen. Then, the HomeMenu is shown and the player is able to access all other screens through the buttons.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - This constructor throws IOException when the HighScore list or the InfoScreen photos do not exist.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method is called when the game starts to load. The game title is set, the game screen is centered and the game screen is made visible.

    • enableGameBoard

      public void enableGameBoard() throws java.io.IOException
      This method is called when the player clicks the start button on the HomeMenu. The HomeMenu is removed and the GameBoard is loaded. The game screen is centered, the game is initialized and window focus listeners are added.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - This constructor throws IOException if game background image is not found.

    • autoLocate

      void autoLocate()
      This method is used to center the game screen on the window screen.

    • enableHighscoreBoard

      public void enableHighscoreBoard()
      This method is called when the player clicks the HighScores button on the HomeMenu. The HomeMenu is removed and the HighScore Board is loaded. The HighScore Board is centered and made visible.

    • enableHomeMenu

      public void enableHomeMenu()
      This method is called when the player clicks the back button on the HighScore Board. The HighScore Board is removed and the HomeMenu Board is reloaded, re-centered and made visible.

    • enableCustomConsole

      public void enableCustomConsole()
      This method is called when the player clicks the Customise button on the HomeMenu. The Custom Console is set visible.

    • enableInfoScreen

      public void enableInfoScreen()
      This method is called when the player clicks the Info button on the HomeMenu. The Info Screen is set visible.
